title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-2.17 - Split shift
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-2.17 - Split shift

State Regulations
A
split shift
is a schedule of daily
hours in which the working hours required or permitted are not consecutive. No
meal period of one hour or less shall be considered an interruption of
consecutive hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
142-2.17

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
